captions.text:
l knew you'd
bring that up.

Clemens sucks.
He can't carry Dwight's jock.

trying to keep my dick hard
in a cruel world.

Vito's down.
Vito's down, all right?

You stepped on
my brand-new white Air Jordans.

Yeah! l'll fuck
your prick two times!

Who told you to be
in my neighborhood?

Who told you to buy a brownstone
in my neighborhood?
What do you want to live

in a black neighborhood for,
anyway?

l understand this is
a free country.

A man can live
wherever he wants.

Free country?
l should fuck you up for saying that.

Yo, man. Your Jordans
are fucked up!

Might as well throw them shits out.
They're broke.

They looked good
before he messed them up.

He was even talking
about your mama--

Shit, you used
to be so fine!

You're lucky
l got a loving heart.

Next time,
cross the street quick.

You should buy me
another pair!

You're lucky l'm
a righteous black man!

Otherwise you'd be
in serious trouble! Serious!

title: Do the Right Thing (4/10) Movie CLIP - Your Jordans Are F***ed Up! (1989) HD

comments.text:
Whats so brilliant about this scene, besides all the caricatures of people 
in the community, but even the subtle touch of a white man living in 
brooklyn wearing a larry bird shirt. And he's from Brooklyn, showing a tiny 
microcosm of the black vs white mentality that grew from bird vs magic.﻿
comments.author: clibreros94

comments.text: I can't believe this is the same guy from breaking bad﻿
comments.author: kellegirl619

comments.text:
*THIS MOVIE IS FULL OF PROPAGANDA*

This is the worst movie ever made and should be set on fire and I am going 
to tell you why. People all of all colors, shapes, back grounds, etc are 
not born with racism or hate in their hearts. These things are TAUGHT 
through movies like this and school's teaching about the KKK. I am a young 
26 yrs old Italian male now. But from a very young age I have always had 
African American friends we just seemed to always get along. Racism at the 
age of 7 never crossed my mind not once I was too young to even understand 
what that even meant at the time. And if BULLSHIT ass movies like this 
where not made and where washed out over the years no one would know. All I 
knew was that my family members where Italian so when I saw this movie at a 
tender age it blew me back and displayed some very disgusting things. 
Racist comments from both sides, violence against one another, things I 
have never seen etc. Spike Lee obviously has the upper hand in this movie 
and displays to the viewers that it's the African Americans that have the 
last word vs everyone else and tries to display with dominance at the end 
of the movie by destroying other people's property. The whole movie is 
about racist comments back and forth and spike lee tries to discredit what 
the other men in the movie have to say and that African Americans have all 
the talent and everything anyone could want in life. He tries to push this 
with propaganda to younger viewers. Color has ZERO to do with happiness, 
health, wealth, etc. These things have to do with Will power and having the 
right mind set. These things aren't about color they are about small minded 
weak individuals with low self esteem. Kill this BS so American's of all 
COLOR can grow!﻿

Tyson, Ruby Dee, James Earl Jones. Angela, Cicely, and Ruby played Nurses 
and got Oscar Nominations while Four Alumni were in Various Productions of 
Dreamgirls. To me it's a poetic justice because in the last Two Years you 
hardly Saw Black Actors on The Show.
